page.title: 01Chalfont St Peter Bucks
page.content: This block contains part of Chalfont St Peter, part of Gerrards Cross,part of Denham and a settlement called West Hyde. Through it run the A413 road from Aylesury to London, the North Orbital road and a recently opened section of the M25 motorway. There are flooded gravel pits on its eastern edge where people sail their boats, and the willow-bordered River Misbourne flows through the western section, having been damned to form an arficial lake at one point. The extreme western edge of the block is a residential area with many large and expensive houses.The remainder of the block consists of agricultural land, woodland and a golfcourse. It is a popular residential area .
